name: Hoarder (Wee3, Walarion, Wianna, Eddie_Klint)
description:
The Great Journey Gamejam may build by Axel, Eddie, Viktoriia and Ronald.

Hoarder is a horror inspired retro game, hoarding is the obsession with collecting items and throw away as little as possible, as the object's emotional value is put on a high pedestal. Throw away your grandmother's old Christmas sweater, wedding dress and many other old dusty cloth pieces once and for all and free yourself from the terror.

Movment: WASD + Mouse

Jump: Space

Duck: Ctrl
